creator: jratzlaff@emich.edu
text:
The "SEARCH" method is not recognized with Request_Method variable.  If SEARCH 
was recognized a lot of people could be saved a bunch of heartache caused by 
that stupid WebDAV exploit.  This pain causes logs to be junked up and my cause 
problems with servers that are storage-critical.

creator: nd@perlig.de
text: The request is aborted before setenvif is even seen.
